arguments.name: Dark Mode Feature Implementation
arguments.description: Implementing a dark mode theme across all screens of our mobile application to improve user experience in low-light environments.

arguments.name: Real-Time Notification Strategy
arguments.problem_statement: To implement real-time notifications in our application, we need to choose between WebSockets and polling-based approaches. We have decided to use WebSockets due to its efficiency and ability to provide instant updates. This decision requires documenting the architectural tradeoffs considered before finalizing this approach.
arguments.success_criteria: The workunit will be completed when: 1) The architectural decision to use WebSockets is clearly documented, including the rationale for choosing it over polling. 2) All key stakeholders have been informed about this change and understand its implications. 3) The technical implementation plan using WebSockets has been outlined with clear next steps. 4) Potential challenges and mitigation strategies are identified and documented.
arguments.description: This workunit documents our decision to implement real-time notifications using WebSockets instead of traditional polling mechanisms. We will analyze the tradeoffs between these approaches, document the architectural implications, and outline the implementation plan moving forward. The goal is to ensure all team members understand why this approach was chosen and what it means for future development.
